title: Swearing, Swear, Sware, Sworn
cleaned_text: - Beer-sheba; because there they sware, [Gen. 21:31](/study/scriptures/ot/gen/21.31?lang=eng#p31). - I did swear to give it to Abraham, [Ex. 6:8](/study/scriptures/ot/ex/6.8?lang=eng#p8). - which he sware unto thy fathers to give thee, a land, [Ex. 13:5](/study/scriptures/ot/ex/13.5?lang=eng#p5). - not take the name of the Lord thy God in vain, [Ex. 20:7](/study/scriptures/ot/ex/20.7?lang=eng#p7). - not swear by my name falsely, [Lev. 19:12](/study/scriptures/ot/lev/19.12?lang=eng#p12). - Lord ... sware that I should over Jordan, [Deut. 4:21](/study/scriptures/ot/deut/4.21?lang=eng#p21). - Thou ... shalt swear by his name, [Deut. 6:13](/study/scriptures/ot/deut/6.13?lang=eng#p13). - possess the good land which the Lord sware unto thy fathers, [Deut. 6:18](/study/scriptures/ot/deut/6.18?lang=eng#p18). - hath not lifted up his soul unto vanity, nor sworn deceitfully, [Ps. 24:4](/study/scriptures/ot/ps/24.4?lang=eng#p4). - [Heb. 3:11](/study/scriptures/nt/heb/3.11?lang=eng#p11); [4:3](/study/scriptures/nt/heb/4.3?lang=eng#p3)). repent, [Ps. 110:4](/study/scriptures/ot/ps/110.4?lang=eng#p4) ( [Heb. 7:21](/study/scriptures/nt/heb/7.21?lang=eng#p21)). 132:11](/study/scriptures/ot/ps/132.11?lang=eng#p11) ( [Acts 2:30](/study/scriptures/nt/acts/2.30?lang=eng#p30)). - every knee shall bow, every tongue shall swear, [Isa. 45:23](/study/scriptures/ot/isa/45.23?lang=eng#p23). - swear ... but not in truth, [Isa. 48:1](/study/scriptures/ot/isa/48.1?lang=eng#p1) ( [1 Ne. 20:1](/study/scriptures/bofm/1-ne/20.1?lang=eng#p1)). - how should my name be polluted, [Isa. 48:11](/study/scriptures/ot/isa/48.11?lang=eng#p11). - Lord hath sworn by his right hand, [Isa. 62:8](/study/scriptures/ot/isa/62.8?lang=eng#p8). - he that sweareth in the earth shall swear by the God of truth, [Isa. 65:16](/study/scriptures/ot/isa/65.16?lang=eng#p16). - surely they swear falsely, [Jer. 5:2](/study/scriptures/ot/jer/5.2?lang=eng#p2). - because of swearing the land mourneth, [Jer. 23:10](/study/scriptures/ot/jer/23.10?lang=eng#p10). - sware ( ... they break out, [Hosea 4:2](/study/scriptures/ot/hosea/4.2?lang=eng#p2). - They have spoken words, swearing falsely, [Hosea 10:4](/study/scriptures/ot/hosea/10.4?lang=eng#p4). - Lord God hath sworn by his holiness, [Amos 4:2](/study/scriptures/ot/amos/4.2?lang=eng#p2). - They that swear by the sin of Samaria, [Amos 8:14](/study/scriptures/ot/amos/8.14?lang=eng#p14). - every one that sweareth shall be cut off, [Zech. 5:3](/study/scriptures/ot/zech/5.3?lang=eng#p3). -
